thread.section_title: Houzz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Houzz | www.houzz.com
thread.title: CHarissa

author: CHarissa
title: CHarissa
text: Horrible return policy and dishonest disclosure. I ordered 4 chairs with "free" shipping. If I return them, I not only have to arrange return shipping myself, and pay for it, and the restocking fee of %20 (which I expected). But they also plan to deduct the out bound "free" shipping from my refund. This was not disclosed anywhere on the website, which I know becauseI searched hard for return policy. Outrageous fraud. PLEASE PICK A MORE REPUTABLE COMPANY!
